TopicTitle: Bug Report: Loaded savegame of recovered vehicle starts at KSC with vehicle HUD

Articles.Content:
It's pretty much as the title says, here are the steps to reproduce:

 

Launch vehicle

Land and recover vehicle

Save game

Exit, and load the save

 

The game will load to the KSC, but with a vehicle HUD/etc, but no vehicle will be present.

 

Hope this helps, I encountered this by mistake just now
